page.title: 08MR. AND MRS. HUNTER.
page.content: The Hunters are the{biggest } {landowners}in Michaelchurch.Mr.Hunter farms about{600 acres}but owns a lot more which he has tenanted.Although he is engaged in mixed farming most of his work is involved with sheep.He also owns most of the{fishing rights } of The Escley and the{shooting rights} over the hills. Mr.Hunter is related to the{Trafford {family}and lived as a child at The Court.Mrs.Hunter originally lived in London and Hertfordshire but moved to a house just outside Usk before marrying.Her only involvement in the farm is{breeding ponies}which is one of her hobbies.She also has a passion for{hunting.}The rest of her time is spent being involved in village life, as a School Governor,the Secretary of the Parochial Church Council and a Collector for the N.S.P.C.C.
